amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike funding for the Joint Strike Fighter's Alternate Engine Program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 80 printed in House Report 111-498 to strike funding for the Joint Strike Fighter's Alternate Engine Program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pingree (ME) amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 193 - 231, 3 Present (Roll no. 316).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A008) offered by Ms. Pingree (ME).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
